title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rep. Thomas Massie | 3/30/20
description:
Today’s coronavirus update: New York’s 911 system is overwhelmed, state travel restrictions have started, and the virus has hit Mexico. Meanwhile, Joe Biden’s not doing well against Trump in the polls, but Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s somehow popular. Rep. Thomas Massie explains why he believes the stimulus bill is a “wealth transfer” that Congress didn’t want to answer for.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
